Class MessageShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.MessageShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class MessageShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class representing the shape of the message.

    Afraz Salim

        y - The y-coordinate of the begin point of the message shape.
